headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://cloudflareinsights.com https://static.cloudflareinsights.com; style-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; img-src 'self' https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; connect-src 'self' https://cloudflareinsights.com; frame-src 'none'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self';
